segments.text: That sink is a total disaster, water gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle spreading across the floor is gross, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing right in it, her shoe probably ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's just polishing that plate like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse, climbing around the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand in the cookie jarâ€” crumbs everywhere soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks filthy from use, tilting in the wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, begging for treats amid the slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water dripping down the cabinet doors is just nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen's turning into a soggy nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the tidy garden can't save this indoor filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness with the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinets are inviting more chaos and dirt.
segments.speaker: PAR
